content: Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang's Spirit Power allows you to take the form of the massive frog and perform a sweeping strike with it's long tongue. This attack can deal some decent damage and has great reach. Having Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang equipped as your Spirit also reduces Stamina cost for jumping, including jump attacks, which is a nice bonus.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang's Spirit Power allows you to take the form of the massive frog and perform a sweeping strike with it's long tongue. This attack can deal some decent damage and has great reach. Having Baw-Li-Guhh-Lang equipped as your Spirit also reduces Stamina cost for jumping, including jump attacks, which is a nice bonus.
